message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR. 

This paper proposes a new task for measuring the ability of a model to generate an entailed sentence from a source sentence, which is relevant to natural language processing (NLP) tasks such as information extraction, machine translation, and question answering. The paper also uses LSTM with attention for training and proposes a method for generating natural language inference chains and constructing an entailment graph from source sentences. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), which are directly related to NLP and machine learning. The paper also involves deep learning techniques, so cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper proposes a method for generating new sentences, which could be relevant to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval) sub-categories.
